pages.title: Univite
pages.text: The heartbeat of the universe pulsates within this ingot. An otherworldly alloy of various extraterrestrial materials.$(p)This should truly make the most powerful items known to mankind.

pages.title: Obtaining Univite
pages.text: There is no currently known method of creating Univite synthetically, and it does not generate in nature.$(p)Its very existence is a mystery of the universe lost to the sands of time. Perhaps someday, it'll be rediscovered...

pages.title: Usages
pages.text: Univite can be used to create top tier $(thing)tools$() and $(thing)armor$().

pages.title: Stats
pages.text: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 7$(br)Base Durability: 3918$(br)Mining Speed: 12$(br)Attack Damage: 6$(br)Enchantability: 22$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 50$(br)Total Defense: 27$(br)Toughness: 5$(br)Enchantability: 22
